channel.title: How do i change the way players start off when they log in (for the 1st time)
channel.description: some servers have like ghostly with santa hat.... etc... and have a guy with spikyish hair i wan2 make it customized to my way---- also i would like to change starting position? to my new home....

item.title: How do i change the way players start off when they log in (for the 1st time)
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

On another topic

Yeah or you can do it in the client can’t you? I dont have a source downloaded so I forgot, xD

You. Please for the love of God get off this thread, you are helping NOONE.

BACKONTOPIC;
To change the appearance of your character you would look for a code that looks like

		playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=-1;

That is pretty self explanatory if you read the code. But what you need to do is input the code of an item into the slot there you want and the ones you don’t want an item in you would leavea as -1.

Near that code you should see one that looks like this

		//Setting player standard look
		playerLook[0] = 7;
		playerLook[1] = 21;
		playerLook[2] = 28;
		playerLook[3] = 33;
		playerLook[4] = 40;
		playerLook[5] = 44;

For that you would need to experiment with the numbers until you find the look you want. Here are the numbers you will be needing there

[code]/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change the way players start off when they log in (for the 1st time)
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

look in player.java and when u log in ur server get the x cords and search them in player.java then when u find them it will have x here//x here and under them will be the y cords… dont change the //1’s only change the 1s on the opposite side of the //

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the way players start off when they log in (for the 1st time)

item.title: How do i change the way players start off when they log in (for the 1st time)
item.dc:creator: @penguinn penguinn
item.description:
@penguinn wrote:

First you need to scroll down in your “client.java” were it says “charactersappearance” in most cases it says “change appearance” and then you jsut put ID of what you want in the area. and for the starting point, go to client.java and search for startingpoint

Read full topic
